name: DB Kamehameha
text:
Target 1 face-up "DB" Beast-Warrior or Warrior monster you control and 1 face-up monster your opponent controls in the same column as your monster; The first target cannot declare an attack this turn, it's effects are negated until the End Phase, and inflict damage to your opponent equal to it's ATK. If you do, destroy all cards your opponent controls in the same column as the second target. You must control a face-up "DB" Beast-Warrior or Warrior monster in order to activate and resolve this card's effect.

Concept by MauGamesLOL
